mapper.sql: select id id, name name, alias alias, description description, pid pid, type type, ordernum ordernum, icon icon, perms perms, url url, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified, is_deleted isDeleted from sys_menu
mapper.update: update sys_menu set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update sys_menu set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in (#{item})

update sys_menu set id=#{id}, name=#{name}, alias=#{alias}, description=#{description}, pid=#{pid}, type=#{type}, ordernum=#{ordernum}, icon=#{icon}, perms=#{perms}, url=#{url}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}

update sys_menu set id=#{id}, name=#{name}, alias=#{alias}, description=#{description}, pid=#{pid}, type=#{type}, ordernum=#{ordernum}, icon=#{icon}, perms=#{perms}, url=#{url}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into sys_menu ( id, name, alias, description, pid, type, ordernum, icon, perms, url, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{alias}, #{description}, #{pid}, #{type}, #{ordernum}, #{icon}, #{perms}, #{url}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

( #{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.alias}, #{item.description}, #{item.pid}, #{item.type}, #{item.ordernum}, #{item.icon}, #{item.perms}, #{item.url}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
